reasoning.step2:
I'll evaluate each extracted field with reasoning and a confidence estimate.

1) GrandTotal.Amount: 2944.36
- Evidence: The text shows "Endbetrag EUR 2.944,36" which matches 2,944.36 EUR.
- Consistency: Calculated from Net 2,676.69 + VAT 267.67 = 2,944.36, matches printed Endbetrag.
- Confidence: Very high (≈ 98%).

2) Invoice.Date: "29-01-2024"
- Evidence: The header shows "Wien, 29-01-2024" near the top-right; that is the invoice/issue date.
- Possible ambiguity: There is also "vom: 22-01-2024" for Auftrag and delivery dates elsewhere, but the "Wien, 29-01-2024" is the document date.
- Confidence: High (≈ 95%).

3) Sender.VatId: "ATU22642807"
- Evidence: The text contains "ATU22642807" on a separate line (likely sender UID/VAT number).
- Possible ambiguity: Another UID appears later "UID-Nr.: ATU 43349701" — need to verify which is sender. The extracted value ATU22642807 appears above payment terms and near company details; the line "UID-Nr.: ATU 43349701" appears later possibly referencing the buyer or another entity. Ambiguity lowers confidence.
- Confidence: Moderate (≈ 70%).

4) Vat.Rate: 10
- Evidence: The invoice shows "+ 10 % Mehrwertsteuer" which indicates 10% VAT rate.
- Consistency: VAT amount (267.67) equals 10% of Net 2,676.69 (267.669 → rounded 267.67), consistent.
- Confidence: Very high (≈ 98%).

5) Net.Amount: 2676.69
- Evidence: The text shows "Auftragssumme 2.676,69" which is the net/order sum.
- Consistency: Net + VAT = GrandTotal matches.
- Confidence: Very high (≈ 98%).

6) Vat.Amount: 267.67
- Evidence: The text shows "267,67" next to VAT line.
- Consistency: Equals 10% of Net when rounded; Net + VAT = GrandTotal.
- Confidence: Very high (≈ 98%).
